    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorLookupTable

        public ColorLookupTable(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> colors,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> values)
        Ctor Attention: The the color and the value vector must have the same amount of entrys.
        Parameters:
        colors - - the colors that should be used to color the given values
        values - - the values that should be colored by the colors

      • ColorLookupTable

        public ColorLookupTable()
        DefCtor Creates a default CLUT initialized with a color-range from red over green to blue. And a value-range from 1 over 0 to -1.

    • Method Detail

      • setRange

        public void setRange(double min,

        Sets a new range for the clut. During this call the colors of the clut won't be removed.

      • getRangeOfValues

        public double[] getRangeOfValues()
        Function that returns the range (the minimum and the maximum) of values of this CLUT.
        Returns:
        - an array of two doubles, the first entry represents the minimum-value and the second one the maximum-value of the CLUT.
